com.mapzen.tangram

Class MapController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapzen.tangram.MapController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.opengl.GLSurfaceView.Renderer

    public class MapController
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.opengl.GLSurfaceView.Renderer
    MapController is the main class for interacting with a Tangram map.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  MapController.CameraType
      Options for changing the appearance of 3D geometry
      static class  MapController.DebugFlag
      Options for enabling debug rendering features
      static class  MapController.EaseType
      Options for interpolating map parameters
      static interface  MapController.FeaturePickListener
      Interface for a callback to receive information about features picked from the map Triggered after a call of pickFeature(float, float) Listener should be set with setFeaturePickListener(FeaturePickListener)
      static interface  MapController.FrameCaptureCallback
      Callback for captureFrame(FrameCaptureCallback, boolean)
      static interface  MapController.LabelPickListener
      Interface for a callback to receive information about labels picked from the map Triggered after a call of pickLabel(float, float) Listener should be set with setLabelPickListener(LabelPickListener)
      static interface  MapController.MarkerPickListener
      Interface for a callback to receive the picked Marker Triggered after a call of pickMarker(float, float) Listener should be set with setMarkerPickListener(MarkerPickListener)
      static interface  MapController.ViewCompleteListener

      void pickFeature(float posX, float posY)
      Query the map for geometry features at the given screen coordinates; results will be returned in a callback to the object set by setFeaturePickListener(FeaturePickListener)

    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT_EASE_TYPE

        protected static MapController.EaseType DEFAULT_EASE_TYPE

    • Constructor Detail

      • MapController

        protected MapController(android.opengl.GLSurfaceView view)
        Construct a MapController using a custom scene file
        Parameters:
        view - GLSurfaceView for the map display; input events from this view will be handled by the MapController's TouchInput gesture detector. It also provides the Context in which the map will function; the asset bundle for this activity must contain all the local files that the map will need.

    • Method Detail

      • captureFrame

        public void captureFrame(MapController.FrameCaptureCallback callback,
                         boolean waitForCompleteView)
        Capture MapView as Bitmap.
        Parameters:
        waitForCompleteView - Delay the capture until the view is fully loaded and no ease- or label-animation is running.

      • screenPositionToLngLat

        public LngLat screenPositionToLngLat(android.graphics.PointF screenPosition)
        Find the geographic coordinates corresponding to the given position on screen
        Parameters:
        screenPosition - Position in pixels from the top-left corner of the map area
        Returns:
        LngLat corresponding to the given point, or null if the screen position does not intersect a geographic location (this can happen at high tilt angles).

      • lngLatToScreenPosition

        public android.graphics.PointF lngLatToScreenPosition(LngLat lngLat)
        Find the position on screen corresponding to the given geographic coordinates
        Parameters:
        lngLat - Geographic coordinates
        Returns:
        Position in pixels from the top-left corner of the map area (the point may not lie within the viewable screen area)

      • addDataLayer

        public MapData addDataLayer(java.lang.String name)
        Construct a collection of drawable map features.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the data collection. Once added to a map, features from this MapData will be available from a data source with this name, just like a data source specified in a scene file. You cannot create more than one data source with the same name. If you call addDataLayer with the same name more than once, the same MapData object will be returned.

      • requestRender

        public void requestRender()
        Manually trigger a re-draw of the map view Typically this does not need to be called from outside Tangram, see setRenderMode(int).

      • setRenderMode

        public void setRenderMode(int renderMode)
        Set whether the map view re-draws continuously Typically this does not need to be called from outside Tangram. The map automatically re-renders when the view changes or when any animation in the map requires rendering.
        Parameters:
        renderMode - Either 1, to render continuously, or 0, to render only when needed.

      • setTapResponder

        public void setTapResponder(TouchInput.TapResponder responder)
        Set a responder for tap gestures
        Parameters:
        responder - TapResponder to call

        Set a responder for pan gestures
        Parameters:
        responder - PanResponder to call; if onPan returns true, normal panning behavior will not occur

      • setRotateResponder

        public void setRotateResponder(TouchInput.RotateResponder responder)

        Parameters:

        Parameters:

        public void setShoveResponder(TouchInput.ShoveResponder responder)
        Set a responder for shove (vertical two-finger drag) gestures
        Parameters:
        responder - ShoveResponder to call; if onShove returns true, normal tilting behavior will not occur

                                          TouchInput.Gestures second,
                                          boolean allowed)
        Set whether the gesture second can be recognized while first is in progress
        Parameters:
        first - Initial gesture type
        second - Subsequent gesture type
        allowed - True if second should be recognized, else false

        Parameters:

        second - Subsequent gesture type
        Returns:

        public void setPickRadius(float radius)
        Set the radius to use when picking features on the map. The default radius is 0.5 dp.
        Parameters:
        radius - The radius in dp (density-independent pixels).

      • pickFeature

        public void pickFeature(float posX,
                        float posY)
        Query the map for geometry features at the given screen coordinates; results will be returned in a callback to the object set by setFeaturePickListener(FeaturePickListener)
        Parameters:
        posX - The horizontal screen coordinate
        posY - The vertical screen coordinate

      • pickLabel

        public void pickLabel(float posX,
                      float posY)
        Query the map for labeled features at the given screen coordinates; results will be returned in a callback to the object set by setLabelPickListener(LabelPickListener)
        Parameters:
        posX - The horizontal screen coordinate
        posY - The vertical screen coordinate

      • pickMarker

        public void pickMarker(float posX,
                       float posY)
        Query the map for a Marker at the given screen coordinates; results will be returned in a callback to the object set by setMarkerPickListener(MarkerPickListener)
        Parameters:
        posX - The horizontal screen coordinate
        posY - The vertical screen coordinate

        public Marker addMarker()
        Adds a Marker to the map which can be used to dynamically add points and polylines to the map.
        Returns:
        Newly created Marker object.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        whether or not the marker was removed

        public void applySceneUpdates()

      • useCachedGlState

        public void useCachedGlState(boolean use)
        Set whether the OpenGL state will be cached between subsequent frames. This improves rendering efficiency, but can cause errors if your application code makes OpenGL calls.
        Parameters:
        use - Whether to use a cached OpenGL state; false by default
